channel.title: No-ip help please!
channel.description: this is probably the simplest of things, but do i need to run no-ip and how? :confused:

item.title: No-ip help please!
item.dc:creator: @sarge2050 sarge2050
item.description:
@sarge2050 wrote:

i dont have a router and i use no-ipâ€¦ what i did was went to www.no-ip.com and i registered my email and everything then i logged in then clicked add then typed in the hostname used one of the No-ip Free Domains ip things and changed nothing else but the ip address (change it to your ip address) then i clicked Create host. Next i went to my server source ran the server and it says something like starting pimpscape on 0.0.0.0:(then some numbers) then i went to moparscape and logged into what i typed in for the hostname on No-ip plus the free domain i chose and i went to file - new port and typed in the numbers that came after 0.0.0.0: in runserver then clicked ok then tried logging in

Read full topic
